Name: Brain Break
About the game: Brain Break is a minimalistic but not simple puzzle game. The object of the game is to move all the cubes to their positions of their color. It's not as easy as it sounds! The player can push one cube at a time, but not pull it. FEATURES: ✔ Addictive gameplay; ✔ 20 different levels, from easy to difficult; ✔ Nice background music; ✔ Saving records.
